description.zh-cn: 中国白族心血管内科军医，曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: A Chinese cardiovascular physician of the Bai ethnicity, serving in the military. She was a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区，杨丽霞的籍贯所在省份。
description.en: A province-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, where Yang Lixia's ancestral home is located.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国云南省，是杨丽霞的籍贯地。
description.en: A city in Yunnan Province, China, and Yang Lixia's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个少数民族，杨丽霞所属的民族。
description.en: An ethnic minority group in China, to which Yang Lixia belongs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队第九二〇医院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队第九二〇医院
en: 920th Hospital of the People's Liberation Army Joint Logistics Support Force

description.zh-cn: 位于云南省昆明市的一所军队医院，杨丽霞曾在此担任心血管内科主任。
description.en: A military hospital located in Kunming, Yunnan Province, where Yang Lixia once served as the director of the Department of Cardiovascular Medicine.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七个大军区之一，辖区包括四川、云南等地。昆明总医院曾隶属于此。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army, with jurisdiction over areas including Sichuan and Yunnan. Kunming General Hospital was formerly subordinate to it.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军军医大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 位于重庆市的军队医科大学，杨丽霞是该校的博士生导师。
description.en: A military medical university in Chongqing, where Yang Lixia is a doctoral supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 位于云南省昆明市的医科大学，杨丽霞是该校的博士生导师。
description.en: A medical university in Kunming, Yunnan Province, where Yang Lixia is a doctoral supervisor.

en: Military doctor of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民解放军中从事医疗工作的专业技术人员的统称。
description.en: A general term for professional and technical personnel engaged in medical work in the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是云南大理人。
description.en: Yang Lixia is from Dali, Yunnan.

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是白族人。
description.en: Yang Lixia is of the Bai ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yang Lixia is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

position.zh-cn: 解放军和武警部队代表
position.en: Deputy of the People's Liberation Army and Armed Police Force delegation

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是第十三届全国人民代表大会解放军和武警部队代表。
description.en: Yang Lixia was a deputy of the People's Liberation Army and Armed Police Force delegation to the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队第九二〇医院

position.en: Director of the Department of Cardiovascular Medicine

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞曾担任成都军区昆明总医院（现第九二〇医院）心血管内科主任。
description.en: Yang Lixia previously served as the Director of the Department of Cardiovascular Medicine at Kunming General Hospital of the Chengdu Military Region (now the 920th Hospital).

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是第三军医大学（现陆军军医大学）的博士生导师。
description.en: Yang Lixia is a doctoral supervisor at the Third Military Medical University (now the Army Medical University).

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是昆明医科大学的博士生导师。
description.en: Yang Lixia is a doctoral supervisor at Kunming Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 杨丽霞是一名中国人民解放军军医，专攻心血管内科。
description.en: Yang Lixia is a military doctor in the People's Liberation Army, specializing in cardiovascular medicine.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军联勤保障部队第九二〇医院
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 昆明总医院（现第九二〇医院）曾隶属于成都军区，直到2016年成都军区被撤销。
description.en: Kunming General Hospital (now the 920th Hospital) was subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region until the region was disbanded in 2016.
